title: ISA Planning & Risk Assessment
description: Planning procedures covering engagement acceptance, entity understanding, materiality and risk identification.

items.text: Confirm engagement acceptance/continuance and independence documentation is signed.
Assign engagement team, assess competence, and record planning meeting minutes.
Document overall timetable including deadlines for key milestones.
Capture industry, regulatory and external factors influencing the entity.
Summarise key business processes, IT environment and significant classes of transactions.
Evaluate design of relevant controls and determine whether to test operating effectiveness.
Select appropriate benchmark and calculate overall materiality with rationale.
Set performance materiality and clearly document chosen percentage.
Establish clearly trivial threshold communicated to the team.
Perform fraud brainstorming and record significant fraud risk factors.
Identify significant risks requiring special audit consideration (incl. management override).
Execute preliminary analytics and note unusual trends requiring follow up.
